title: View Validation In SwiftUI
summary: In this article, I introduce a reusable and flexible method for validating views with an action in SwiftUI, eliminating the boilerplate often associated with traditional approaches. Inspired by Flutter’s TextField validation mechanism using WidgetKeys, the method is designed to work seamlessly across different view types, making it ideal for developers seeking clean and efficient validation solutions.

title: Generic Vuexy Table In Flutter
summary: This article demonstrates how to replicate a data table component using Flutter, showcasing its potential for building multi-platform web applications. Inspired by Vuexy’s popularity, the project evolved into a concept for developing a flexible and adaptable framework suitable for various purposes. The article highlights Flutter’s versatility and provides insights into creating dynamic UI components.
